paper_abstract: It is shown that an infinite lumped-element LC-ladder network generates all Bessel functions J(n)(t) of the first kind as a response to a single non-zero initial condition. Closed-form expressions for the voltage responses in the time domain are presented if the LC-ladder is driven by a step-like input voltage.
paper_title: System Response to a Single Non-zero Initial Condition in a Lumped-Element LC Ladder
